Zahi Hawass , the director of the museum, said: Demonstrators in collaboration with security forces stopped the thieves and returned the relics to the museum- but they were already damaged. Only their heads were intact. Republicans and Democrats go through this all the time, Smith said. "Particularly party activists don't see a candidate who is either well enough known, or ideologically or intellectually consistent enough for them, so they try to recruit people who fit the bill.

On Saturday I was horrified to witness Mayor Tom Leppert Pro Tem Dwaine Caraway gleefully proclaiming that a power had been bestowed on him to give the man who tried to kill my dog a key to my city, Richard Hunter said. Richard Hunter called Dwaine Caraway 's action an embarrassment to the city "rouge decision to besmirch the reputation of the city."
